schedules.name: Reddit Scan
schedules.description: Scan Reddit for HOA financing discussions every 2 hours
schedules.prompt: Scan r/HOA, r/condoassociation, and r/realestate for engagement opportunities related to HOA financing, special assessments, capital projects, or reserve funding. Score each post for relevance (1-100) and return the top 10 opportunities. For each, include: post title, summary, author, URL, age, relevance score, and reason for relevance.

schedules.name: Facebook Groups Scan
schedules.prompt: Scan Facebook HOA groups for engagement opportunities related to HOA financing, special assessments, capital projects, or reserve funding. Focus on groups where board members and property managers discuss funding decisions. Score each post for relevance (1-100) and return the top 10 opportunities.

schedules.name: LinkedIn Scan
schedules.description: Scan LinkedIn CAI groups 2x daily on weekdays
schedules.prompt: Scan LinkedIn Community Association Institute (CAI) groups and property management professional pages for engagement opportunities. Look for discussions about HOA financing, reserve studies, special assessments, or capital project funding. Score each post for relevance (1-100) and return the top 10 opportunities.

schedules.name: Forums Scan
schedules.prompt: Scan BiggerPockets HOA forums and Quora for HOA financing questions. Look for discussions about special assessments, HOA loans, capital project funding, or reserve funding. Score each post for relevance (1-100) and return the top 10 opportunities.

schedules.name: Post Approved Responses
schedules.description: Check for approved responses and post them every 30 minutes
schedules.prompt: Check the engagement queue for responses with status 'approved'. For each approved response, post it to the appropriate platform (Reddit, Facebook, LinkedIn, etc.) with proper formatting and UTM tracking. After successful posting, update the status to 'posted' and record the posted_at timestamp. Handle any errors gracefully and update the status accordingly.

schedules.name: Engagement Tracking
schedules.description: Update engagement metrics for posted responses daily
schedules.prompt: For all responses posted in the last 30 days, check their current engagement metrics (likes/upvotes, replies/comments, clicks from UTM tracking). Update the database with current metrics. Identify hot leads (high relevance + strong engagement + decision-maker signals) and send alerts via Telegram for immediate follow-up.
